room_title: Escape room "Home Alone" by Mastermind Room Escape in St. Louis
review: We had a group of six (high school, college, and adults). Had a blast cause everyone participated in solving mysteries!!

room_title: Escape room "Home Alone" by Mastermind Room Escape in St. Louis
review: I appreciated that as soon as we walked in, we were pleasantly greeted. We did Home Alone which was very challenging. We barely made it. Thank you for a fun, family friendly experience!

room_title: Escape room "Home Alone" by Mastermind Room Escape in St. Louis
review: Home alone was a lot of fun. Get off your phone and do this!! Afterwards you cn get a good meal at Sauce on the Side over on 8th
